1.verse: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.

2.verse: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.

3.verse: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.

4.verse: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

5.verse: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.

6.verse: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.

7.verse: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.

8.verse: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.

9.verse: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
